comment1: Name represents name of the variant or name of the entity
comment2: model and animation fields represent file names located in assets/isleofberk/geo/entity/*dragon ID*/ and assets/isleofberk/animations/entity/*dragon ID*/ respectively
comment3: *dragon ID* represents path part in entity's ID. I.e. for Deadly Nadder dragon ID would be deadly_nadder, for Gronckle - gronckle. Exception is Monstrous Nightmare. It'll be just nightmare
comment4: It's not necessary to declare both name and model fields. In fact, you can declare neither of them
comment5: You also can redirect saddle textures in similar manner. Look at any dragon with saddle here to see example
comment6: Redirect declarations can be added under any namespace
comment7: Full path to redirect file would look something like this: assets/yournamespace/model_redirect/*dragon ID*.json
comment8: Comments do nothing btw, you can yeet them
